title: Each occupant shall be rehabilitated and given the carpet area occupied by him for residential purpo
clause_text: Each occupant shall be rehabilitated and given the carpet area occupied by him for residential purpose in the old building subject
section: 33(6) Reconstruction of buildings destroyed by fire or which have collapsed or which have been demolished under lawful order
